content.body: shu: am i right that step 1 of https://tc39.es/ecma262/#sec-arraybufferbytelength could also be achieved by using IsFixedLengthArrayBuffer()? (and perhaps checking both slots in there, since the ArrayBufferByteLengthData slot is what's used in the AO)
